snippet: The frenzied appetite seen among the industry behemoths is catching on among the second-tier players.
abstract: Atlantic Broadband announces $200 million takeover of MetroCast Communications of Connecticut; move signals that smaller operations, and not just big players in cable business, are also pursuing mergers.
lead_paragraph: The frenzied appetite seen among the industry behemoths is catching on among the second-tier players.

headline.main: Atlantic Broadband Deal Shows Small Operators Seek Growth, Too
headline.print_headline: With Atlantic Broadband Deal, Smaller Cable Companies Join the Merger Derby
